title: Matt Smith | A Closer Look: FCC Votes to Repeal Net Neutrality; Omarosa Drama Continues
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Federal Communications Commission's vote to repeal the Obama-era net neutrality rules and the Trump White House's petty dramas.

Then, Matt Smith dishes on what it's like to play Prince Philip on The Crown, including what Prince William thinks about it, and reflects on Doctor Who's devoted fan base.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
